text:
@EliStokols @PressSec Oh, it's "historic" alright.

U.S. history post post-2020: "As President, Donald Trump's response to the COVID-19 virus was not sufficient to keep hundreds of thousands of Americans from dying. It was the worst virus-related disaster in U.S. history."
